content: 你是一个乐于助人的助手。
你好！有什么可以帮助您？
你好！有什么我可以帮助你的吗？
It seems like you might be feeling frustrated. I'm here to help, so please let me know what's on your mind or how I can assist you!
It sounds like you might be expressing some frustration or confusion. If there's something specific you'd like to discuss or if there's any way I can assist you, please let me know!
